reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was only 75% full due to Ramadan and so you would expect that the service would have been of a good standard. I am afraid that this was not the case. Many of the Staff were simply not attentive nor interested and there seemed to be very little managenent present to maintain standards.
reviews.title: This Hotel lacks that personal touch.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The deluxe room that we had booked, was a little lacking for a 5* rated hotel although all areas were kept very clean, and the grounds are well kept, green and lush.
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday

reviews.text: There was plenty of entertainment for children, with a majority of English and Turkish families. There were adult only areas in the restaurants and bars, but there was little stipulation that this should be enforced, and children were often rather rowdy in these areas.
reviews.title: stayed with mum dad and bro

reviews.text: I'm afraid to say that Hilton International will have to raise their standards in order to bring this Hotel up to the standard set by other hotels visited in the Belek area of Turkey.
reviews.title: Perfect holiday, we did not want to get back!
Another lovely stay at Hilton Dalaman
reviews.text: I really look forward to, and appreciate my holidays, and I rarely grumble without due cause, however, Hilton Hotels did not come up to the mark on this occasion

Great hotel had a fantastic time except for the fact that most of the staff working in activities seem to think that it is perfectly acceptable to hit on all the female guests. Even the head of activities is a woman and appeared to think it totally acceptable to chat up my wife. I would go again but only if this changed.
reviews.title: great hotel with only one drawback

reviews.text: Quality hotel with everything you could need- food was amazing, staff very friendly and rooms/hotel areas were spotless.
reviews.title: Amazing value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lots of lovely areas to sit around the grounds without feeling crowded. Drinks were of good quality and always nice and cold.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel and Staff!

reviews.text: The gym was a little small but with loads of classes held (yoga etc..) this wasn't too much of an issue.
reviews.title: Fab Holiday!

reviews.text: Evening entertainment was brilliant (not normally something I would expect to enjoy) but it was such good quality with things like acrobats, dancers etc..
reviews.title: An all-round excellent resort!

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for a fortinight at the beginning of July with friends and family. There was definitely something for everyone with ages ranging from 2 - 40's!
reviews.title: Fantastic Value for Money

reviews.text: The rooms were lovely with a big wetroom, spacious bed and sitting area and a nice balcony.
reviews.title: Boring

reviews.text: I can't thank our cleaning lady Rabia enough, her and all the service staff couldn't do enough for us.
reviews.title: Hilton / Dalaman

reviews.text: Our room had stairs down to the adults pool which was great except for the people who are above the rules and had there children constantly in the adult pool. Despite my husband telling the reception staff verbally and by email several times the under 12yr old children were always there. It was the same 4 families that were responsible the whole time so perhaps we were just unlucky.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels around the world

reviews.text: The main buffet restaurant was what I would expect from a 5 star hotel. Plenty of choice and always different menus each day. The cafe's for lunch were also great. We didn't try any of the restaurants as we felt we had more than enough choice at the buffet restaurant. The serving staff there were also very good.
reviews.title: Resort living at its best

reviews.text: Writing this on our last night here and absolutely gutted to be going home :0(
reviews.title: Even better 2nd time Around!

reviews.text: This is the first time in my life i have ever re-visited a hotel for a 2nd time and believe me when i say it was even better than last year.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but.....

reviews.text: From the inital booking (thank you Zuhal Alkan) it was an absolute joy to be back.
reviews.title: Loved It

reviews.text: The food this year was much better and the service is very much improved.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also the evening shows were incredible!
reviews.title: Very good hotel
